messages.message: :hammer_and_wrench: Hey team, our frontend tests GitHub action will now report test coverage on changed files (ex (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71731#issuecomment-3033734303)). You can also click on the file name/line # to see which lines are uncovered. We previously had a GitHub action reporting test coverage, but I decided to change it because the original one required running all tests to generate coverage and could not handle caching properly. Hope this is helpful and encourages everyone to add unit tests when needed!
